```{r library}
library(dplyr)
library(readxl)
library(ggplot2)
library(readr)
```

```{r setup}
getwd()
YTSData2018csv <- read.csv("nyts2018.csv")
```

```{r Duplicating and saving new dataset}
YTSDataNumbers2018 <- YTSData2018csv
write.csv(YTSDataNumbers2018, file = "NYTS2018DataNumbers.csv")
```

```{r renamecol}
YTSData2018 <- YTSData2018csv %>% 
  select("Q2","Q3","Q28","Q31","Q25","Q35","Q36","Q7","Q11","Q10","Q6","Q15","Q45","Q64","Q51","Q53","Q72","Q78","Q74")

YTSData2018 <- YTSData2018 %>%
  mutate(Year = 2018) %>%
  relocate(Year, .before = 1)


YTSData2018 <- YTSData2018 %>%
  rename(
    "Gender" = Q2,
    "Grade_of_Student" = Q3,
    "E_Cig_Ever_Used" = Q28,
    "E_Cig_Days_Used" = Q31,
    "E_Cig_Curiousity" = Q25,
    "E_Cig_Try" = Q35,
    "E_Cig_Try_Next_Year" = Q36,
    "Cigarette_Ever_Used" = Q7,
    "Cigarette_Days_Used" = Q11,
    "Cigarette_Last_Used" = Q10,
    "Cigarette_Curiosity" = Q6,
    "Cigarette_Try" = Q15,
    "Cigarette_Try_Next_Year" = Q45,
    "The_Real_Cost" = Q64,
    "Any_Tobacco_Craving" = Q51,
    "Attempt_Quitting_Tobacco" = Q53,
    "Are_Tobacco_Products_Harmful"  = Q72,
    "E-Cig_Promotions_Internet" = Q78,
    "Tobacco_Promotions_Internet" = Q74
  )
```
